data.actual_result: A second or less after that discord will become not responding and crash fully.
data.expected_result: Nothing spectacular happens, one file has been uploaded
data.short_description: Uploading a file the wrong way crashes discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Hit the upload button on you chat box - Instead of selecting the file by clicking, drag it into the discord client and it should pull up the upload prompt - hit upload. - Close out the file select prompt
